AutoSync.Name: Automatic Sync
AutoSync.Hint: Automatically sync PDF data when character sheets are opened or at regular intervals.

SyncInterval.Name: Sync Interval (minutes)
SyncInterval.Hint: How often to check for and perform automatic syncing (in minutes). Minimum 1 minute, maximum 30 minutes.

DebugMode.Name: Debug Mode
DebugMode.Hint: Enable debug logging for troubleshooting sync issues.

Warnings.NoActor: No actor selected! Please select a character token or open a character sheet.
Warnings.NoSyncedData: No synced data found for this character. Run sync first!

Errors.NoPDFPager: PDF-Pager module not found! This module requires PDF-Pager to function.
Errors.SyncFailed: Failed to sync PDF data! Check console for details.

Info.DataFresh: Character data is already up to date.
Info.LoggedToConsole: Data has been logged to the browser console (F12).
Info.UseModuleSettings: Use the Module Settings to configure Daggerheart PDF Sync options.

NoData.Title: No Synced Data
NoData.Content: This character has no synced data. Would you like to sync PDF data now?

ClearData.Title: Clear Synced Data
ClearData.Content: Are you sure you want to clear all synced data for this character? This action cannot be undone.
